# Rubidium Extra

[![CurseForge](http://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/title/654373.svg)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/rubidium-extra)
[![Modrinth](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da545&label=modrinth&query=title&url=https://api.modrinth.com/api/v1/mod/rubidium-extra&style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/rubidium-extra)


Features that shouldn't be in Rubidium.

## Building from source

#### Prerequisites

- Java 17 or above

#### Compiling

Navigate to the directory you've cloned this repository and launch a build with Gradle using `gradlew build` (Windows)
or `./gradlew build` (macOS/Linux). If you are not using the Gradle wrapper, simply replace `gradlew` with `gradle`
or the path to it.

The initial setup may take a few minutes. After Gradle has finished building everything, you can find the resulting
artifacts in `build/libs`.
